name: 古典電動力學（二）
goals: Familiarize students with the fundamental principles of electrodynamics
syllabus:
【16+2 Weeks】

Maxwell Equations, Macroscopic Electromagnetism, Conservation Laws  
Plane Electromagnetic Waves and Wave Propagation.  
Radiating Systems, Multipole Fields and Radiation.  
Scattering and Diffraction.  
Collisions, Energy Loss, and Scattering of Charged Particles, Cherenkov and Transition Radiation (selected topics).  
Radiation by Moving Charges (selected topics)
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
